name: Bug Bounty Vulnerabilities - Notion Template
description: Are you looking to take your bug bounty hunting skills to the next level?Ever found it hard to organize your notes when learning a new vulnerability for Bug Bounties?Worry no more as you can now write your notes in a well-formatted way to have a better understanding of the vulnerability. With this template, you'll have the all the information and knowledge in one place to succeed in this exciting field.Whether you're a seasoned bug bounty hunter or just getting started, this template is the perf
